text: Ranar da munafikai maza da munafikai mata ke cewa waÉ—anda suka yi imani: "Ku dube mu, mu yi makamashi daga haskenku!" A ce (musu): "Ku koma a bayanku, domin ku nemo wani haske." Sai a danne a tsakaninsu da wani garu yana da wani Æ™yaure, a cikinsa nan rahama take, kuma a bayansa daga wajensa azaba take
